text: @NYGovCuomo You gave an Edict for Nursing Homes to take Covid-19 patients then passed a Law freeing YOU and your Gangster DumboCrap! Government from being sued!!! I will take your Butt to the Supreme Court over the Unconstitutionally past LAW!!! As Judge Dread said “I am the LAW!”
